title: Katie Price to confront former BFF Jane Pountney over her affair with Kieran Hayler for her sensational new reality show
text:
TV Magazine POPCORN AT THE READY Katie Price to confront former BFF Jane Pountney over her affair with Kieran Hayler for her sensational new reality show 
Oh that Pricey does know how to make good TV… By Lauren Franklin, Showbiz Reporter 21st February 2017, 11:32 pm Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments KATIE Price is set to come back to reality TV with a bang by confronting former best friend Jane Pountney over her affair with husband Kieran Hayler. 
The 38-year-old glamour model is ensuring her next reality venture is as headline grabbing as ever so will be taking the cameras to Jane’s house to question her over her betrayal which came to light in April 2014. News Group Newspapers Ltd 3 Katie Price is set to confront former best mate Jane Pountney years after she had an affair with Kieran Hayler 
A source told Heat: “Katie’s got a new reality show in production and they’re already filming. 
“She plans to go to Jane’s house with the camera crew, knock on her door and confront her on camera. She’ll ask why she betrayed their friendship and if it was worth it.
